title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 83.2 - Investigation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 83.2 - Investigation

State Regulations

The professional conduct officer shall direct that an
investigation be done of the circumstances surrounding such conviction or act, and shall submit a report of the findings and a recommendation as to whether to
proceed to a formal hearing to the State professional standards and practices
board for teaching or to a subcommittee of such board, as determined in the
bylaws of the board, composed of no fewer than five members approved by
majority vote of the board, to consider such reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
83.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
